name: A NEW COURT WIZARD
text:
A NEW COURT WIZARD

Caros Cocceius has appointed Saturius as the new Court Wizard of Ebonheart. Following a spectacular trial of magical abilities, the Imperial edged out his fellow apprentice, Kelkemmello. The elevation of Saturius follows soon after a traveling %PCClass reported the tragic demise of the former Court Wizard, Tarhiel. Apparently the Wood Elf fell victim to a magical mishap on the island of Vvardenfell.

MESSAGE FROM THE EDITOR

A previous issue of the Bellman erroneously listed the late Court Wizard Tarhiel's race as Argonian. He was, in fact, a Wood Elf.
